item.title: CVE-2024-43244|2024-09-13T13:29:08.981Z -- favethemes -- houzez
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in favethemes Houzez allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Houzez: from n/a through 3.2.4.
